name: BasketballStandingsSkill
0:
”Alexa, open basketball standings”
”Alexa, ask basketball standings for Portland”
”Alexa, ask basketball standings for the Lakers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: basketball standings
des: The Basketball Standings skill gives live updates on NBA conference and division standings. Just say "Alexa, open basketball standings" and follow the prompts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
